advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Change your habits, and you can change your life.
Lite Version: Work on 3 habits (upgrade for more)
*WINNER: US Surgeon General's Healthy Apps Challenge!

Make life easier by creating habits that support your goals.   

Video: http://ow.ly/ihDu2 

Top Ranked - Over 200,000 people have downloaded Healthy Habits or HH Premium

Healthy Habits is an app that helps you put your good intentions into action! Most of us know what we want to change…we often even know how to do it.  The problem arises because we don’t put that knowledge into action.
 
Healthy Habits is focused on taking ACTION!  

Did you know? Healthy Habits was Ranked #1 in iTunes New & Noteworthy for Health & Fitness apps.

Isn't it time you take ACTION to create your better life?  Download this app NOW and get started!

It takes up to 60 days to form a new habit.  This app helps you be successful by holding you accountable and offering reminders and rewards along the way... and it is easy!

1. Identify a couple habits that will help you reach your goal (start easy)
2. Start tracking your progress
4. Celebrate your success!

If you are ready to make positive changes, Healthy Habits can help! Sorry - the app can’t do the work for you, but it can remind you about what’s important, track your progress and even send you reminders if you get off track.  Add in some awards and motivational messages and you have a system that leads to success!

Healthy Habits is:
- A system for creating lasting change
- A place to track and log your progress
- A tool that helps you meet your goal 

5 Stars - “Positive changes in my pocket.”-  D.D.

“The future of personal development is in apps like HH (Healthy Habits) that assist us in planning changes, reminding us of our goals, and tracking our progress. This is the future!”   - D.E.
 
Healthy Habits gives you everything you need to work on changing 3 habits. 

- Make or Break 3 Habits (upgrade for more)
- Custom Reminders
- Scheduled Daily Reminder/Alarm
- Motivational Quotes
- Large Habit Library 
- Create Custom Habits
- Custom Motivations & Rewards
- Lots of Reports/Graphs
- Customized Icons
- Share your progress with friends
- Add your own photos for motivation
- Statistics Tracking, Sharing & Export
- Streaks View
- Change App Colors
- Add Background Photo
- Backups via Dropbox

This app has a huge library of suggestions for bettering yourself. I picked a few aspects to focus on and this app has already helped me become more considerate of others and more productive throughout my work day.”   - E.M.
 
“Healthy Habits  is amazingly rich in helpful features, but the biggest value to me is that it helps me hold myself accountable for things I want to change. “ - J.M.

Healthy Habits is a 3rd generation behavior modification tool developed by 2Morrow. We also offer private label versions of this app. 

If you have comments or questions, please contact us at info@2MorrowInc.com.  

If you like the app… please rate it in the app store!
